name: Watch Driving Simulator
description:
Experience a whole new class of Apple Watch games by utilizing the power in the new Apple Watch Series 6 and Apple's Metal 2 technologies. This application allows for the simple driving of a 1960s Corvette car and can be steered from the Digital Crown.

Due to the high graphic nature of this application, it requires an Apple Watch Series 6. Previous Apple Watch models have not been tested.
